title: You Had Me at 50% Offâ€”25 Chic Gap Sale Finds That Will Be Instant Summer Closet Staples
description: One step closer to effortless outfits.
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
excerpt: One step closer to effortless outfits.
text: If you follow along with my Who What Wear stories, you'll know that Gap is one of my favorite stops for wardrobe essentials no matter the season. This summer's offerings are exceptionally good, plus so many of the best pieces are on major sale right now. Now until June 24, you can get 50% off select pieces, including options that are already on sale. Yes, 50% off.That said, this is not a drill. Now is the perfect time to scoop up anything you had your eye on. I, for one, have my sights set on a variety of summer closet staples including linen separates, pretty dresses, elevated basics, cool accessories and sandals, plus so much more. Don't hesitate because these discounted standouts are going to start selling out soon. Gap Organic Cotton Poplin Big Shirt Gap 365 High Rise Linen-Blend Shorts Gap Mid Rise Barrel Parachute Pants Gap Vegan Suede Slouchy Tote Bag I want this in all three colors. Gap Closeknit Halter Crop Top Halter tops have fashion people's attention. Gap High Rise Ponte Crop Kick Pants Gap Closeknit Crop Tube Top Gap Gap Logo Baseball Hat I always keep a timeless baseball cap handy. Brown dresses are top-of-mind. An elevated flip-flop style. Gap 365 High Rise Linen-Blend Trousers You can never go wrong with sleek black pants. Gap East-West Canvas Tote Bag Gap Linen-Blend Mini Shift Dress Gap Modern Crewneck T-Shirt Gap 100% Linen Oversized Shirt Gap 100% Linen Easy Shorts Gap Open-Weave Straw Tote Bag Gap High Rise Capri Jeans Gap Pointelle Crop Cardigan Gap Vegan Leather Flip Flop Sandals These only look expensive. Gap Linen-Blend Seamed Jumpsuit Can't decide if I like the black or white more?
html:
If you follow along with my Who What Wear stories, you'll know that Gap is one of my favorite stops for wardrobe essentials no matter the season. This summer's offerings are exceptionally good, plus so many of the best pieces are on major sale right now. Now until June 24, you can get 50% off select pieces, including options that are already on sale. Yes, 50% off.

That said, this is not a drill. Now is the perfect time to scoop up anything you had your eye on. I, for one, have my sights set on a variety of summer closet staples including linen separates, pretty dresses, elevated basics, cool accessories and sandals, plus so much more. Don't hesitate because these discounted standouts are going to start selling out soon.
